Functions


Missions

This function is for an app called Rocketeer which I worked on over the summer of 2020. Calling the function will return data for the soonest upcoming rocket launch. This includes satellites, rovers, astronauts, etc.

Mission data was sourced from spaceflightnow.com

Coordinates

This function was also made for Rocketeer. Calling this function will return the longitude and latitude for any location given by name in a format that can be easily read and parsed by Apple’s Swift MapKit.

Coordinates data was sourced from opencagedata.com
